resources.string: Aladdin is a 2019 American musical fantasy film produced by Walt Disney Pictures. Directed by Guy Ritchie, from a script he co-wrote with John August, it is a live-action adaptation of Disney\'s 1992 animated film of the same name, which itself is based on the eponymous tale from One Thousand and One Nights. [1][a] The film stars Will Smith, Mena Massoud, Naomi Scott, Marwan Magnussen ,and Numan /acar,as well as the
